attributes.action: open his eyes to knife crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: our country has an appaling rate of knife crime. teenagers laying dead on our streets, what does our great government say??? there is not a problem. heads should roll and severe sentences should be imposed on those caught with knifes. time to wake up before all kids are wiped out

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
